question: [File: volo-vault/sources/reward_manager.move] [Function: add_reward_balance()] [To Decimals Conversion] At line 352, reward.value() is converted with to_decimals adding 9 decimals - can reward coins with non-standard decimals cause incorrect conversions? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/reward_manager.move] [Function: retrieve_undistributed_reward()] [Decimal Mismatch] At line 681, amount (u64) is converted to decimals - can mismatch between buffer accounting (u256 with decimals) and withdrawal (u64) cause errors? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/reward_manager.move] [Function: claim_reward()] [Reward Amount Cast] At line 622, u256 is cast to u64 - can large accumulated rewards overflow u64 causing incorrect claim amounts? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/reward_manager.move] [Function: add_reward_to_buffer()] [Buffer Amount Precision] At line 392, reward amount has 9 extra decimals - is this consistent with buffer.reward_amounts storage at line 399? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/reward_manager.move] [Function: retrieve_undistributed_reward()] [Amount Precision] At line 682, comparing amount_with_decimals to remaining_reward_amount - can precision mismatch cause false assertion failures? (Medium)
